meta.name: description
meta.content: Join Fairborn Digital Academy for the opportunity to have your student get into smaller class sizes. Online High School programs at FDA allow for students to work around a schedule that fits them best, but still has accessibility to their educators. Be a part of Fairborn Digital Academy for opportunities to succeed!
Fairborn Digital Academy | Online High School Program in Fairborn, OH

Join Fairborn Digital Academy for the opportunity to have your student get into smaller class sizes. Online High School programs at FDA allow for students to work around a schedule that fits them best, but still has accessibility to their educators. Be a part of Fairborn Digital Academy for opportunities to succeed!

img.title: Home

div.style: z-index: 5; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 100px; line-height: 85px; font-weight: 300; color: #ffffff; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:Roboto Condensed;

img.div:
A Modern
Solution
to Academic
Success

div.style: z-index: 6; min-width: 201px; max-width: 201px; max-width: 42px; max-width: 42px; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 18px; line-height: 17px; font-weight: 400; color: rgba(255,255,255,1); letter-spacing: 1.5px;font-family:Roboto Condensed;border-color:rgb(109,190,75);border-style:solid;border-width:2px 2px 2px 2px;outline:none;box-shadow:none;box-sizing:border-box;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;cursor:pointer;

h5.span: Fairborn Digital Academy helps students to take control of their future.

div.class: wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_center wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_fadeIn fadeIn rella_vc_single_image-5e9d346b5fba5

div.p: Small classes and two teachers per class give our students more guidance.

div.class: wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_center wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_fadeIn fadeIn rella_vc_single_image-5e9d346b65c67

div.p: Students and teachers benefit from teamwork in the classroom.

div.class: wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_center wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_fadeIn fadeIn rella_vc_single_image-5e9d346b698a7

div.p: Our non-traditional method prepares students for the real world and for higher education.

div.class: wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_center wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_fadeIn fadeIn rella_vc_single_image-5e9d346b6e2dc

div.p: Fewer students per class and a focus on teamwork helps to engage students.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1527053105047 rella-row-shadowbox-5e9d346b6ecff vc_row-has-fill

p.span: We have said a lot about how our students learn at Fairborn Digital Academy. Our previous and current students have a lot to say on our behalf.

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_30 vc_sep_border_width_4 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text

p.span: “This school has saved me from being a high school drop out. If it weren’t for FDA & the opportunity they’ve given me to do my work at home, I never would’ve been able to pass my freshman year; let alone get to where I am now…”
“Great school and my experience with them was great! The teachers genuinely cared about the students and I couldn’t have asked for more!”
“If it wasn’t for the school I wouldn’t have graduated.”

“… This school is more than just a school to me. We are a community and a team. It’s my home away from home. The teachers have been some of the best teachers I ever have. The counselor has helped me through a lot. The principal knows exactly how to run the place and make it fun…”

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1527005241305 rella-row-shadowbox-5e9d346b709f0 vc_row-no-padding vc_row-o-content-middle vc_row-flex

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Proxima Nova', sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: Our main goal is to offer online education programs available to high school students who require a less traditional learning environment. Each year Fairborn Digital Academy evaluates our students’ progress. It makes revisions to their academic programs to provide each student with the best online learning opportunity possible, to achieve academic success and fulfillment of high school course credit.

a.class: btn btn-default btn-lg border-thick ra_button_5e9d346b8bfed vc_custom_1526948835210

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1525870719352 rella-row-shadowbox-5e9d346b8cc23 vc_row-has-fill vc_column-gap-10 vc_row-o-content-middle vc_row-flex

div.h5: Mark your calendars for these important dates.

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6 text-lg-center text-md-center text-sm-center text-xs-center
vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid rella-row-shadowbox-5e9d346b95541 vc_row-no-padding vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-o-content-middle vc_row-flex

div.p: Fairborn Digital Academy is an online high school program sponsored by the Fairborn City Schools and officially opened its doors on November 14, 2002. Since then, we have had the privilege of helping many students succeed in our collaborative educational environment.

a.class: btn btn-default btn-lg border-thick ra_button_5e9d346b96075 vc_custom_1527124655366

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6 text-lg-center text-md-center text-sm-center text-xs-center vc_col-has-fill rella-column-responsive-5e9d346b9650c

img.title: Video playback is not supported by your browser

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1527035564000 rella-row-shadowbox-5e9d346b96cfa vc_row-has-fill

p.span: Fairborn Digital Academy recognizes the difference in educational techniques. Some traditional high schools can be challenging and not offer the best options for students to grow the way they want. Whether you want to learn at an accelerated pace and gain credits for college or just need a schedule that differs from traditional high school, you can succeed in our online learning environment. Our teachers and accountability coaches want to see you achieve your goals and can help you get there.

vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1527005241305 rella-row-shadowbox-5e9d346bb4537 vc_row-no-padding vc_row-o-content-middle vc_row-flex

div.p: Interested in sharing your talents with the next generation of students at Fairborn Digital Academy? Small class sizes and two teachers for every class make a difference for the students and the staff. Our approach means more one-on-one time with the students and creates a better environment for the student’s growth.

p.em: (Title VI, Title IX, Section 504, Age Discrimination Act, Title II, Boy Scouts of America Equal Access Act)

div.p: The Fairborn Digital Academy does not discriminate based on race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups.
The following designated person handles inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies:

Erik Tritsch
700 Black Lane
Fairborn, Ohio 45324
(937) 879-0511
